Importing libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
```
## Problem 1 

Read the pols-month csv into a dataframe and clean up data 

```{r}
pols_month_df = 
  read_csv("data/pols-month.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") |> 
  mutate(
    month = month.name(as.integer(month))
    )
```
